sense.def:
An excess of something
je večja količina, kot je potrebna ali kot je ponavadi.

seg.quote: Inflation results from an excess of demand over supply.
This report should discourage us all from eating an excess of fat.
The body gets rid of excess water through the urine.

sense.def:
Če nekaj delamo
to excess
, tisto delamo čezmerno.

seg.quote: He spent all his time cleaning and tidying to excess.

sense.def:
Excesses
so dejanja, ki so skrajna, kruta ali neetična.

seg.quote: ...the worst excesses of the French Revolution.
